song_lyrics: Kem re bhulāy, ho kem re bhulāy...
Kem re bhulāy Pramukh Swāmī āpanī prīt amathī bhūlī nā bhulāya.
E nayan namaṇā yād āve, snehnā zaraṇā yād āve,
Ek maṭake pūratā jīvan-bharnī āsh amane kem re bhulāy,
E hasavu mīṭhu yād āve, smaraṇ dīṭhelu yād āve,
Antar-khālīpo bharī detu e tav mukhaḍu kem re bhulāy... Kem re bhulāy. 1
E hasta mangal yād āve sparsha premal yād āve,
Bhūlī doṣh am saghaḷā gaḷe maḷatā e kem bhulāy,
E charaṇ chanchaḷ yād āve, bhīḍo bhayankar yād āve,
Sahī kānṭā parnā dukh haratā pagalā kem bhulāy... Kem re bhulāy. 2
E hṛuday kumaḷu yād āve, amṛut-nizarṇu yād āve,
Paḍyāne prītno ādhār detā tav dhabakār kem bhulāy,
E shabdo divyam yād āve, mukh-tej bhavyam yād āve,
Nij ūngh chhoḍī dhūn karato nād amane kem re bhulāy... Kem re bhulāy. 3
E gurujī vhālā yād āve, smṛutio mārā prāṇ kore,
Khud jalī ātam-dīp am pragaṭāvyā kem bhulāy,
E patra pāvan yād āve, kṛupā sanātan yād āve,
Nav rākhyā amane anāth, e āshiṣh kem bhulāy... Kem re bhulāy. 4
Vhālā Pramukh Swāmī Mahārāj... Nahī re bhulāy...
title: Kem re bhulāy ho kem re bhulāy

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1326: Sadhu Madhurvadandas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
